org.zaproxy.zap.extension.httppanel.view

Interface HttpPanelView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpPanelHexView, HttpPanelParamTableView, HttpPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, HttpPanelTextView, HttpRequestAllPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, HttpRequestAllPanelTextView, HttpRequestBodyPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, HttpRequestBodyPanelTextView, HttpRequestHeaderPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, HttpRequestHeaderPanelTextView, HttpResponseAllPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, HttpResponseAllPanelTextView, HttpResponseBodyPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, HttpResponseBodyPanelTextView, HttpResponseHeaderPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, HttpResponseHeaderPanelTextView, RequestPostTableView, ResponseImageView, ResponseLargeResponseAllView, ResponseLargeResponseSplitView

    public interface HttpPanelView
    A Plugable view which can display requests and responses in different ways
    Author:
    Psiinon
    See Also:
    for an example of how to implement a new view
